overview: There's a special place just waiting for you to visit...Where every day is an adventure. Where fun and learning never end...Where? it's New MacDonald's Farm. MAX and MILLY are fantastic farmers as you can see in 8 new fun in the farmyard stories including The Big Cheese, A very interesting Sheep, Sir Bravest Max, Thunderstruck, Wonder Horse, Fancy Dress Party, and Best of the Best. And there are more great NEW MacDonald's Farm hits to sing Helping Things Grow, Whenever you Smile and Fantastic Farmer.  Join farmers Max and Milly and their wonderful family of animal friends as they spend their days ploughing and planting, singing and dancing, discovering and especially playing. It's a farm-stay like no other!
title: New Macdonald's Farm - Fantastic Farmers
